text: so at BK this is a quick summary of how
to make pork stock and glass noodle soup
called gang dude would send for the full
version please click on the link in the
description let's get started
rinse the pork bones and cover it with
cold water bring to a simmer and let
simmer for about an hour after an hour
skim off the scum that has floated to
the top then add some onions garlic
cilantro roots the top of the lemongrass
and some white pepper let this simmer
for another hour and then the stock is
done now we're gonna take the stock and
make a delicious glass noodle soup start
by slowly frying some garlic until it's
golden and crispy and just set it aside
for now add some of our pork stock and
bring to a simmer mix some ground pork
with some soy sauce and white pepper and
then add it to the soup season the soup
with soy sauce fish sauce give it a
taste and adjust with some salt add some
napa cabbage and let it settled and then
add some rehydrated glass noodles bring
it back to a boil and it's done garnish
it with our fried garlic and drizzle
some of the garlic oil over top with
some green onions and cilantro and it's
ready to serve and that is it for all
the details of this recipe you can click
here to watch the full version and if
you enjoy the videos please click to
subscribe and I will see you next time
popcorn car
